list_definition.definition: to say what is wrong (with a sick person etc) after making an examination; to identify (an illness etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The doctor diagnosed her illness as flu.

list_ex_of_english: No subjects were diagnosed with schizophreniform disorders or schizophrenia.
Many, if not a majority of acyanotic anomalies, can be specifically diagnosed by a physical examination.
In our series, 2 of the 4 patients were diagnosed as having right isomerism associated with complex cardiac anomalies.
Lack of co-operativity in the system's output may be diagnosed from the occurrence of communication problems in simulated or real user-system interaction.
Patients diagnosed with depression, or mixed anxiety and depression, for whom a brief psychological intervention was indicated.
Diagnosis and troubleshooting systems can acquire information regarding the system to be diagnosed directly from the device (on-line) or through human or electronic intermediaries (off-line).
Of the infections identified by this lookback programme, 10 % had already been diagnosed.
Another calf was seen by the attending veterinarian and was diagnosed with cryptosporidiosis.
